text: We can look forward to more intelligent insights from Judge Kavanaugh at his #SCOTUS confirmation hearing tomorrow. His opening statement this afternoon was excellent. https://t.co/LgkI0npurl
I add my appreciation to all the first responders, emergency workers and others who put in long hours to prepare for and respond to #Gordon. https://t.co/RpJ0AXc4ze
I've cosponsored two #prolife bills authored by @SenSasse and @marcorubio. Both are important measures aimed at protecting infants and youth. Read more here: https://t.co/cpwgq6ZdEe

Let's honor the families of members of the #ArmedForces who have made the ultimate sacrifice to protect our freedoms and secure our nation. The Senate has passed my resolution setting Sept. 23-29 as 'Gold Star Families Remembrance Week.' Read more: https://t.co/UtZtl8j38r https://t.co/O0pZuzBpJr

Another excellent jobs report released today: 201,000 jobs added in August! Under @POTUS leadership, the U.S. economy has added more than 3.5 million new jobs. This is great news for the USA and Mississippi.

Judge Brett Kavanaugh's week-long #SCOTUS confirmation hearing ended today. He nailed it! Now we can look forward to a Committee vote and then getting him confirmed by the full Senate. #ConfirmKavanaugh https://t.co/qSsTUCsMd6

Today we remember the cowardly terrorist attacks on our great nation, and the bravery of so many Americans 17 years ago. Let's recommit ourselves to defending American freedom and liberty. #NEVERFORGET #September11th https://t.co/yceepsb3AG

Veterans care receives strong support in a @DeptVetAffairs funding bill cleared by the Senate for @POTUS signature. Proud of the good work put into this bill with leadership of @SenShelby & @JohnBoozman. More here: https://t.co/U0xIOHG9Ro
Enjoyed visiting today with Jessica Fly of Grenada and National Hardwood Lumber Association reps to discuss the #FarmBill and trade. https://t.co/MxeaV3lYBq

With House action today, Congress will send a FY19 appropriations package to @POTUS. The bill funds important @USACEHQ flood & water infrastructure projects in Mississippi. Read more: https://t.co/rikRAUe5Gx https://t.co/s9xOAL9oW4

The economy in MS and USA is stronger because of a pro-growth agenda anchored by lower taxes and fewer regulations. I also credit hard workers like those at the @CaterpillarInc plant in Corinth. More about my visit here: https://t.co/WRm5WV2Apl https://t.co/orXUfOydTc

Celebrate #ConstitutionDay and the wisdom within the U.S. Constitution. For 231 years, it has served as the foundation for the greatest nation in the world. May God continue to bless America. https://t.co/RdgLoI0hDD
Thank you to everyone involved with #Florence relief efforts, including the @RedCross @USNationalGuard and other volunteers-especially those from Mississippi. https://t.co/7F0v0DrQ8Q

I'm happy to support the Senate-passed Opioid Treatment and Recovery Act. It's a strong response to the trafficking of fentanyl, heroin, and other #opioids, while also addressing the need for better abuse prevention and treatment options. Read more: https://t.co/I9vK8pYvNo https://t.co/xPCsHAewYQ

Happy 71st Birthday to the US Air Force! Mississippi is proud of @Columbus_AFB and @81trwKeeslerAFB, and all the women and men who serve in the @usairforce. Their bravery ensures we remain the greatest #airpower in the world. https://t.co/3wx9HMdC3W

Overwhelming Senate support for #defense measure with an additional $19.8 billion to continue rebuilding our military might. Let's get it to @POTUS to sign. More here: https://t.co/KYoc9HFddG https://t.co/0UYbVCssIA

Wonderful to be at the @WhiteHouse today to visit with more than 70 Mississippi leaders taking part in intergovernmental affairs meetings. Shared my views on the positive, pro-growth work being done by @POTUS and the Republican Congress. https://t.co/YzGJHe6fLZ

Gold Star Families Remembrance Week, Sept. 23-39. Take time this week to honor families whose loved ones who made the ultimate sacrifice defending our great nation. #ThankYou #GoldStarFamiliesRemembranceWeek #GoldStarMothers https://t.co/UtZtl8j38r https://t.co/4P8lFqrrkx

Sexual assault of any kind is unacceptable, but it is becoming very apparent that a major partisan effort is underway to undermine not just Judge #BrettKavanaugh’s nomination, but his character. My statement: https://t.co/f4otSoZS6b

What an honor to meet some of the courageous families at the @TAPSorg Gold Star Families event today to commemorate ‘Gold Star Families Remembrance Week.’ I’m so grateful for those servicemembers and their families who have given so much for our freedom. https://t.co/VZ0hmLfw6B

There can only be profound sadness when we lose dedicated law enforcement officers to senseless violence. Our thoughts and prayers go out to the families of Brookhaven Officers James White and Zack Moak.

Congress completes major legislation to help states and communities fight the #OpioidEpidemic. I supported this effort with an eye on helping rural states like Mississippi. @StandUp_MS #allhandsondeck My statement: https://t.co/4e3bhV9B6a https://t.co/8Z7XVQAlr3

What better news to celebrate #NationalManufacturingDay: The unemployment rate fell to 3.7 percent in September--the lowest unemployment rate since 1969. Mississippi manufacturers can be proud to be part of this progress! #MFGDay18 https://t.co/oJ5RziPFYX

Amid all the furor of this week, it was a true treasure to visit with De’Nahri Middleton of Jackson. This brave young man's "Kidney Man" will be featured on the American Kidney Fund’s 2019 @KidneyFund calendar. https://t.co/NOUnzW3XDS

#BrettKavanaugh earned my vote. I believe he will be a justice whose adherence to the Constitution and the rule of law will be a credit to the Supreme Court and all Americans, https://t.co/MNWHGPbRd0 https://t.co/KJsGfn01Xf
This is a historic day.  I think Brett Kavanaugh will be a great Supreme Court justice and serve our nation well.  Now let's move forward on a positive note. #JusticeKavanaugh https://t.co/gho9fPqHph

There is no room in American politics for violence of any kind.  I support President Trump's commitment to investigate these attempted attacks and bring the full extent of the law on those responsible for these spineless acts.

#VeteransDay2018 is extra special as we mark centennial anniversary of the end of WWI. Offer heartfelt thanks all veterans. As we honor all veterans on this blessed Sunday observance of #VeteransDay, let’s join a grateful nation to #TollTheBell. Ring bells at 11 am local time to honor the brave American men and women who died in World War I, including many Mississippians. @WW1CC https://t.co/ywvMKLXfC9

I'm cosponsoring the Ensuring Coverage for Patients with Pre-Existing Conditions Act. Regardless of the details on how any Obamacare replacement package is written, coverage for Mississippians with pre-existing conditions will be protected. Strong @USCG bill passes Senate with important new authority to:  fight drug smuggling and illegal immigration; cut red tape for vessel owners and operators; and support multi-year shipbuilding contracts. Very good for MS and the USA! My statement here: https://t.co/CAspU3b0Tl https://t.co/xM4fREgIa2
